title: Do grades matter in high school if I am going to a college in Japan? - Quora

response.answer_text: As far as I am aware of, no. The only thing that seems to matter (and I could be mistaken) is your ability to pass a university’s entrance test. Your performance in high school, as a point of reference, does not seem to have any real bearing on admissions. Now, that doesn’t mean you can sleep your way through school (I’m looking at you, every single one of my students). Adolescence is about habit forming. If you have poor habits in school and never learned anything, you aren’t likely to pass the incredibly difficult university admissions tests (as an aside, it’s said that if you have enough knowledge to pass the test, you basically already have the degree). So while your grades themselves might not matter, the work needed to get those grades will.

This is me assuming you're an American student. I have one word for you. GOOGLE. That’s all it took for me to answer your question and I did it because I was honestly prepared to be like, what the heck is wrong with you? Because what popped in my head immediately was, if you don’t have good grades how do you expect to be able to keep up with Japanese education? While grades don’t always represent someone’s intellectual capabilities it does somewhat show a persons knowledge on a subject. And if you have really bad grades, you need to catch up. Theirs a reason why Japan is ranked one of the highest in education, their kids study. While the requirements to enter a Japanese college don’t include grades and it is said they take it a little easy with foreigners this doesn’t mean you should slack off. It also doesn’t mean that the schools you apply to won’t see your grades, you still have to hand in a transcripts accord their requirements and still are required to take an entrance exam like any other students and if you didn’t do well in high school it may be difficult to pass this exam. But these are just my thoughts. Best of luck!
Are you prepared to do well on the entrance exam?
